document.full_text: mohamed bin hammam will be the only challenger for the fifa presidency when incumbent sepp blatter stands for re-election on june 1, soccer's world governing body confirmed on monday.
document.title: fifa confirms two-horse race for president
lines_and_colors: mohamed bin hammam will be the only challenger for the fifa presidency when incumbent sepp blatter stands for re-election on june 1, soccer's world governing body confirmed on monday.
